keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working for more jobs and fairer taxes; stopped 10% rise of tax for those earning less than Â£12,500.
Preventing nasty and damaging Conservative plans; removed the top rate of income tax for millionaires; stopping the sell-off of state assets and firing staff for no reason.
Aiming to balance the country's books by 2018 while protecting vital services.
Campaigning for the Navy, protecting jobs in the dockyard and fighting for new frigates to be built and based in Portsmouth.

mentions.candidate: Leader of the City Council for 10 years
mentions.tacticalSituation: The election in the south of Portsmouth is incredibly tight between several parties. Supporting the Liberal Democrats locally is key to ensuring a Conservative MP is not elected.

leaflet.personalStatement:
Dear ___
Many families across Portsmouth and Southsea tell me that having a decent well-paying job and fairer taxes is essential for them.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked hard to make sure there are good jobs available in the city. In that time, nearly 19,000 more jobs were created in Portsmouth.

images.caption: Gerald Vernon-Jackson, Liberal Democrat Candidate for Portsmouth South
